    Advocate - Md. Abul Kalam

judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: POCSO case No. 86/2019                                                                Order-sheet Present: Sh. S.K. PoddarSpecial Judge, Morigaon19.03.2020Accused person is present today.Report of inquiry from JJB, Morigaon is received, wherein accused N Islam is declared as child in conflict with law.Accordingly, original case record along with original case diary and charge-sheet be sent to JJB, Morigaon for disposal. Copy of case record, case diary and charge-sheet be kept for future reference. Accused is directed to appear before Ld. Principal Magistrate, JJB, Morigaon on 22.04.2020.The instant case is disposed of.
